title: Spicy smooth lentil soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil, or as needed', '1 onion, minced', '250g red lentils', '50g rice', '2.5L boiling water', '2 tablespoons sweet red pepper paste', '3 tablespoons dried mint', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '2 chicken stock cubes', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 lemons']
